MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH49 postcode area of Greasby, affecting properties in Stapleton Avenue and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:31AM on 7th November 2020
